metadata.title: Micro SATA Cables|Internal Mini SAS SFF-8087 Right Angle Cable (0.75m) - Fast & Secure Data Transfers for Controller-to-Backplane Connections.
features: High-performance data transfers: With a 6G rated speed, this Internal Mini SAS SFF-8087 Right Angle to Internal Mini SAS SFF-8087 cable ensures fast, reliable and seamless data transfers.
Versatile connector design: The right angle on one end of the connector allows for easy connection in tight spaces, while the straight end provides versatility in different configurations.
Secure connection: The 36-pin mini SAS interconnect provides a secure and reliable connection between controllers, expanders, backplanes and internal-to-external adapters.
Space-saving solution: The 0.75-meter length of this cable makes it the perfect choice for connecting a controller to an internal multi-drive backplane in environments where space is limited.
description: The Internal Mini SAS SFF-8087 Right Angle to Internal Mini SAS SFF-8087 cable is designed for high-performance data transfers between controllers, expanders, backplanes and internal-to-external adapters. With a 6 G-rated speed, this cable ensures that your data transfers are fast, reliable and seamless. The right angle on one end of the connector allows for easy connection in tight spaces as it bends away from the latch clip. The other end of the connector is straight, making it ideal for use in a variety of different configurations. The 36-pin mini SAS interconnect makes it the perfect choice for a wide range of internal storage applications. This cable features SFF-8087 connectors on both ends, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of controllers, expanders and backplanes. The internal 36-pin mini SAS interconnect provides a secure and reliable connection, making it ideal for use in high-performance data centre environments. The 0.75-meter length of this cable makes it the perfect choice for connecting a controller to an internal multi-drive backplane in environments where space is limited. Whether you are a data centre professional, IT administrator, or system builder, this Internal Mini SAS SFF-8087 Right Angle to Internal Mini SAS SFF-8087 cable is an essential component for your storage infrastructure. In conclusion, if you're looking for a high-performance, reliable and versatile cable for your internal storage needs, look no further than the Internal Mini SAS SFF-8087 Right Angle to Internal Mini SAS SFF-8087.
